title: Provides for certification of vote by local board of elections for all votes
summary: Requires county boards of elections to provide the state board of elections with votes cast for all nominations.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2248

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                   January 18, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sen.  KRUGER -- read twice and ordered printed, and when
         printed to be committed to the Committee on Elections

       AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to  certification  of  the
         vote

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Subdivision 3 of section 9-200  of  the  election  law,  as
    2  amended by chapter 9 of the laws of 1978, is amended to read as follows:
    3    3. The board forthwith, upon the completion of the canvass, shall file
    4  with  the  state  board  of  elections a certified copy of its tabulated
    5  statement of the votes cast for each nomination or party position [in  a
    6  district  extending  beyond  the  political  unit for which the board is
    7  acting].
    8    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.






        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD07386-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to certification of the vote
